mule.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/validation http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/validation/current/mule-validation.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/schedulers http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/schedulers/current/mule-schedulers.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/sftp http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/sftp/current/mule-sftp.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-current.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/core http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/core/current/mule.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mulerequester http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mulerequester/current/mule-mulerequester.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/objectstore http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/objectstore/current/mule-objectstore.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/sfdc http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/sfdc/current/mule-sfdc.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/cloudhub http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/cloudhub/current/mule-cloudhub.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/batch http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/batch/current/mule-batch.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/dw http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/dw/current/dw.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/tracking http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/tracking/current/mule-tracking-ee.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/vm http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/vm/current/mule-vm.xsd

object-to-string-transformer.doc:name: Object to String
object-to-string-transformer.doc:description: Consume Payload and retrieve Interface ID as String

set-variable.doc:name: FV: Set Interface ID
set-variable.doc:description: Set Interface ID in flow variable InterfaceID, this will be used for the Logging framework Transactions

enricher.doc:name: Message Enricher : Invoke Logging Framework
enricher.doc:description: Invoking Logging Framework in message Enricher, so that Payload is not overwritten. Transaction Name and ID is retrieved Transactio ID and Transaction Name is retrived back from the framework

flow-ref.name: MMIS_Eligibility_ErrorLoad_LogInProgressTransaction_Sub_Flow
flow-ref.doc:description: Invoking Logging Framework to start Transaction This starts a new Transaction for MMIS 450B File and thus takes care of the Business rule "FOCUS needs to create a separate transaction record for 450B file in the interface dashboard and generate exception report using 450b and log it under transaction record and send an email to business users to evaluate the exception report" by creating Transaction

mulerequester:request.doc:name: Mule Requester: Retrieve MMIS Eligibility Error Load File
mulerequester:request.doc:description: Retrieve MMIS Eligibility Error Load File, the filename is passed to the Requestor. Returns file content if file is found otherwise returns null Also this takes care of the Business Rule "DMMA Places two files in DTI SFP folder. One is 450 response file with all Eligibility details and 450b with exception report where given MCI does not exists on their end or given MCI do not hold any Eligibility records." by getting the 450b exception report file

validation:is-not-null.doc:name: Validation : Validate Not Null Payload
validation:is-not-null.doc:description: Validate that the Requestor didn't give Null Payload. If Null payload is recieved , an Exception is thrown, this will happen when there is no file in the SFTP directory

object-to-string-transformer.doc:name: Object to String : Consume Payload
object-to-string-transformer.doc:description: Consume Payload and convert to String to make it reusable

set-session-variable.doc:name: Set TransAttachment
set-session-variable.doc:description: Creating TransAttachment for the Logging framework, this is backup of the file to Stored in Salesforce

enricher.doc:name: Message Enricher : Invoke Logging Framework
enricher.doc:description: Invoking Logging Framework in message Enricher, so that Payload is not overwritten. Transaction Name and ID is retrieved Transactio ID and Transaction Name is retrived back from the framework

sftp:outbound-endpoint.doc:name: SFTP : Archive File
sftp:outbound-endpoint.doc:description: Archive File in the configured SFTP Location

set-payload.doc:name: Set Payload : Split Records by Line Feed character
set-payload.doc:description: Split Records by Line Feed character

message-properties-transformer.doc:name: Message Properties : Delete Trans Attachment
message-properties-transformer.doc:description: Delete TransAttachment so that the attachment does not get stored in subsequent Log transactions Also Deletes 450 MMIS Eligibility Load Transaction Error Attachment if present

set-session-variable.doc:name: Session Variable : Set Total Record Count
set-session-variable.doc:description: Set Total Record Count determined by the length of array obtained. Total Error Count will be the same as this count

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message : Invalid Length Records Process
dw:transform-message.doc:description: This Transformation Filters out records which are not of Correct length Also this step creates a Error Report for these records This will be added to the overall Error report
dw:transform-message.dw:set-variable: %dw 1.0 %output application/csv header=false --- payload filter ((sizeOf $) != 68) map { "record" : $, "error" : "Size of the record expected is 68 but found " ++ (sizeOf $) }

set-session-variable.doc:name: Session Variable : Set Error Attachment
set-session-variable.doc:description: Error Attachment is created this will end up as a separate file other than the main csv format file in the Logging Transaction record

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message : Valid Length Record Process
dw:transform-message.doc:description: This Transformation filters out valid Length Records Also this step creates a Fixed Width payload

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message : Fixed Width Transform
dw:transform-message.doc:description: This Transformation performs Fixed Width Transformation and converts Fixed Width Payload to Java payload of List of Maps

object-to-string-transformer.doc:name: Object to String : Consume Payload
object-to-string-transformer.doc:description: Consume Payload and Convert to String

set-session-variable.doc:name: Session Variable : Set Trans Attachment
set-session-variable.doc:description: Transaction Attachment is created this will end up as a csv format file in the Logging Transaction record

message-properties-transformer.doc:name: Message Properties : Set Success Count, Record Status
message-properties-transformer.doc:description: Set Success Count, Record Status These variables will be used by the Logging framework

set-payload.value: {"InterfaceID": "INF014b", "InterfaceName": "MMIS Elibility Load - 450b","ErrorFilename":"Error/Warning_MMISEligibilityLoad_" ,"ErrorExtension":"txt","CompletedFilename":"MMIS_Eligibility_Error_Load","CompletedExtension":"csv", "TransactionID":"#[sessionVars.TID]", "MuleID":"#[message.rootId]","Status":"#[sessionVars.recStatus]","RecordCount":"#[sessionVars.totalRecCount]","RecordSuccess":"#[sessionVars.totalSuccCount]","RecordError":"#[sessionVars.totalRecCount]","ErrorDescription":"See attached file for details","ExceptionType":"Business","Operation":"Weekly Batch Load", "RecordSkipped":"#[sessionVars.totalSkipCount]"}
set-payload.doc:name: Set JSON Payload for Logging Framework
set-payload.doc:description: Set JSON Payload for Logging Framework, for Completing the Transaction

flow-ref.name: LogTransactionSubFlow
flow-ref.doc:description: Invoke the Logging framework for Transaction completion

set-payload.doc:name: Set JSON Payload for Logging Framework
set-payload.doc:description: Set JSON Payload for Logging Framework for Starting a transaction

flow-ref.name: LogTransactionSubFlow
flow-ref.doc:description: Invoke Logging framework for Starting a transaction
